com.canabang.genietext.transit.model.processor.dbase
Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable<Integer,TreeSet<TransitTime>>
          com.canabang.genietext.transit.model.processor.dbase.Schedule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Integer,TreeSet<TransitTime>>
public class Schedule
extends Hashtable<Integer,TreeSet<TransitTime>>

The schedule associated with a bus in the transit service. Transit service schedules usually have three types of schedules: Weekday, Saturday, and Sunday. Each of these schedules maintains an independent list of times when a bus arrives at a certain stop.

Version:
1.00 2009-05-31 Initial submission.
Author:
rhaq
